TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ExpressionBinding extends System.Object

summary.span: Admite el análisis y la persistencia de una instancia de enlace de expresiones.

span.span: Supports the parsing and persisting of an expression-binding instance.
This class cannot be inherited.
